Class

exports

exports(customFunctions, stringToNumber, language, debug)

Returns an instance of JSON JsonFormula Expression that can be executed later on with multiple instances of JSON Data. The instance of the class has a single search function that can be used to evaluate the expression on a json payload. The advantage of using this over {jsonJsonFormula} function is that it can be performant if a single expression has to be used for multiple json data instances.

Constructor

# new exports(customFunctions, stringToNumber, language, debug)

Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
customFunctions *

custom functions needed by a hosting application.
stringToNumber function null

A function that converts string values to numbers. Can be used to convert currencies/dates to numbers
language
debug array

will be populated with any errors/warnings
